mapper.select: select * from cafe c inner join operator o on c.ccode=o.ccodeinner join bmember b on o.bcode=b.bcode inner join review r on c.ccode=r.ccode where o.bcode=#{bcode}

select * from (select rownum rn, tbl.* from
(select * from cafe order by ccode desc) tbl)
(select c.*,tag from cafe c inner join hashtag h on c.ccode=h.ccode where tag like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by c.ccode desc) tbl)
(select * from cafe where cname like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or caddr like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by ccode desc) tbl)
(Select c.* from cafe c inner join mcategory m on c.mcode=m.mcode where lcode=#{lcode} and cname like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by c.ccode desc) tbl)
(Select c.* from cafe c inner join mcategory m on c.mcode=m.mcode where c.mcode=#{mcode} and cname like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by c.ccode desc) tbl)
where rn between #{pageStart}+1 and #{pageStart}+#{perPageNum}
mapper.update: update cafe set cname =#{cname} , caddr=#{caddr} , ctel =#{ctel} , cimage =#{cimage} , mcode =#{mcode} , cmenu =#{cmenu} , x=#{x} , y=#{y},ccontent=#{ccontent} where ccode =#{ccode}
update cafe set viewcnt=viewcnt+1 where ccode=#{ccode}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tbl.* from (SELECT ccode, cname, caddr,cimage, x, y,(1609.34*(ACOS(SIN(#{y}*3.14159265359/180)*SIN(y*3.14159265359/180) +COS(#{y}*3.14159265359/180)*COS(y*3.14159265359/180) *COS((#{x}-x)*3.14159265359/180))*180/3.14159265359)*60*1.1515) AS distance from cafe order by distance asc) tbl where distance>1 and distance<500) where rn between 1 and 4
